subTitle: Ask us anything about our brand and products, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: What eye care services do you offer?
faqs.answer: OptiPlus provides a comprehensive range of eye care services, including routine eye exams, contact lens fittings, and treatment for various eye conditions. Our team of professionals is dedicated to ensuring your vision health.

faqs.question: How can I book an appointment?
faqs.answer: You can easily book an appointment through our website by selecting your preferred service and available time slot. Alternatively, you can call our customer service team for assistance with your booking.

faqs.question: What should I bring to my eye appointment?
faqs.answer: Please bring any current eyewear you use, a list of medications you are taking, and your insurance information if applicable. This will help us provide the best care during your visit.

faqs.question: Do you offer discounts?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer special discounts. Check our website for current promotions or ask our staff during your visit.

faqs.question: What types of eyewear do you sell?
faqs.answer: We offer a wide selection of eyewear, including prescription glasses, sunglasses, and contact lenses from top brands. Our opticians can assist you in finding the perfect fit for your style and vision needs.

faqs.question: Can I get my prescription filled at your location?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We provide on-site services to fill prescriptions for glasses and contact lenses. Our team ensures that you receive the correct lenses tailored to your needs.
